name: Little Ghost project
storyline: MacMillan is a tiny ghost who dreams of becoming the greatest Wraith of all times and to haunt the world of the living. But he is… Clumsy. After causing a disaster at the Wraith Academy, the little ghost takes on a crazy and burlesque adventure which leads him far beyond the world of the dead and changes him forever!
summary:
Little Ghost Project is a story driven point'n click/adventure game inspired by adventure games of yesteryears from Ron Gilbert and Tim Schafer.
Play as MacMillan, a wannabe Wraith, in a burlesque and colorful universe. Meet fantastically grotesque characters and travel through both worlds. Discover a surprising story full of adventures and twists! Take the lead and help MacMillan to discover the origins of his amazing power. Solve wacky enigmas and engage in epic Grimace Duels with other spooks throughout this adventure that will immerse you in a world inspired by Tim Burton’s cinema!
